name: Wireless Bluetooth Headphones
description: Premium quality wireless headphones with noise cancellation and 30-hour battery life.

name: Smart Fitness Watch
description: Advanced fitness tracking with heart rate monitoring, GPS, and smartphone integration.

name: Organic Cotton T-Shirt
description: Comfortable, sustainable t-shirt made from 100% organic cotton. Perfect for everyday wear.

name: Professional Camera Lens
description: High-quality 85mm portrait lens with fast autofocus and beautiful bokeh effect.

name: Ergonomic Office Chair
description: Comfortable office chair with lumbar support, adjustable height, and breathable mesh back.

name: Stainless Steel Water Bottle
description: Insulated water bottle that keeps drinks cold for 24 hours or hot for 12 hours.

name: Wireless Charging Pad
description: Fast wireless charging pad compatible with all Qi-enabled devices. Sleek and minimalist design.

name: Yoga Mat Premium
description: Extra thick yoga mat with superior grip and cushioning. Perfect for all types of yoga practice.

name: Coffee Maker Deluxe
description: Programmable coffee maker with built-in grinder and thermal carafe. Makes perfect coffee every time.

name: Designer Sunglasses
description: Stylish sunglasses with UV protection and polarized lenses. Perfect for any occasion.

name: Gaming Mechanical Keyboard
description: RGB backlit mechanical keyboard with customizable keys and ultra-responsive switches.

name: Leather Crossbody Bag
description: Handcrafted leather crossbody bag with multiple compartments. Perfect for daily use.
